full_summary:
Title: Fencing Maintenance Standing Offer
======================================================================

Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
----------------------------------------

*Formal Notice ID*: W6897-220049
*Unspsc Code*: 72154000
*Category*: CNST
*Notice Type*: Request for Standing Offer
*Publication Date*: September 9, 2022

Closing Date: September 27, 2022 at 14:00:00
===============

Summary
--------

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier for a Fencing Maintenance Standing Offer, which will provide maintenance services, repairs, and upgrades of chain link and wooden fences at various CFB Suffield sites in Southern Alberta.

Business Requirements
---------------------

The Standing Offer shall be issued for a term of one (1) year with two (2) irrevocable one-year option years. All labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision necessary for inspections, repairs, maintenance, upgrades, and new installation of chain link and wooden fences will be provided.

Contracting Entity
-----------------

The contracting entity for this contract is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

SERVICE REQUIREMENTS
-------------------

* The Standing Offer will cover works on multiple CFB Suffield sites, including but not limited to the BATUS site, various infrastructures at the village of Ralston, utility and natural gas fields, and other facilities in Southern Alberta
* The standing offer will provide maintenance services on an “as required” basis for chain link and wooden fences

Delivery Address
----------------

* The services will be delivered to the Department of National Defence (DND) at CFB Suffield

 key Contact Info
----------------

* Name: Lee, Victoria (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14064065?extsite=MTQwNjQwNjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Attachments {None} 
```
